title: Lantern Hill Premium Garden Flag Yard Decoration; 12" x 18"; Double Sided Reads Correctly Both Sides (Welcome Flowers in a Watering Can)
features: Heavy Duty Double Side Flag; Reads Correctly Both Sides; high quality, thick blackout fabric means that the bright colors of the design are visible on front and back without bleeding onto the other side
Durable polyester banner ideal for outside decoration
House Decor; a cheerful, easy way to decorate your yard, patio, porch, veranda, front door, or deck; an easy way to decorate for a party or BBQ

Garden Flag Size; 12 inch by 18 inch vertical flag, the standard size for garden flags; you may also have seen these referred to as small or mini flags; sewn-in sleeve allows for easy display on standard flag stands, arbors, hangers, and mounts; hardware (sold separately) allows hanging on door, balcony, mailbox, or even your window. 100% Polyester, Imported.
Decorative Summer Lawn Art; vibrant designs with bold beautiful colors from creative, original artwork
description: Are you looking for an easy way to decorate your yard? This on-trend beautiful polyester flag will cheerfully greet your neighbors and guests, welcoming everyone who comes to your home. True double sided so you can see the design from the front and the back. A flag stand (sold separately) is the most common way to display a flag like this with the sewn-in sleeve making for super easy display. You can also find hardware that would allow you to hang this on your door, balcony, mailbox or even your window. 100% Polyester, Imported.
